nodes.title: How to backup only original images of your WordPress site using WP-CLI
nodes.excerpt: I'm member of a WordPress community on WhatsApp. Today, one member raised the following question: "I need to create a backup of all imagesâ€¦
nodes.description: In this tutorial you will learn how to create a backup of all original (full) images of a WordPress site using WP-CLI and wget.
